articles.title: Disappointed with England, says PCB chief Ramiz Raja after ECB confirm withdrawal from Pakistan tour - India Today
articles.description: PCB chairman Ramiz Raja said he is disappointed with England's decision to withdraw from a proposed tour in October. The ECB confirmed their decision to pull out from the tour days after New Zealand returned home from Rawalpindi, citing security concerns.
